title: Chandbali Jhumka Earrings - The "Rani" Collection
features: Classic Chandbali design with intricate floral vine details set with Polki diamonds. Features a central Coral bead and green emerald accents for a vibrant look. Finished with gold bead drops for a traditional touch. Made with traditional Nakshi work which gives earrings antique look.
occasions: Festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranti. These earrings will elevate your look at any party or formal function.
description: These handcrafted Chandbali Jhumka earrings are a perfect blend of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and emeralds ensures a dazzling sparkle, while the Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, lustrous finish. These Jhumkas are not just jewelry; they're a statement of your refined taste and cultural appreciation.
